inclusion.criterion: In good health (American Society of Anesthesiologists classification I or II)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Having one non-surgical tooth for extraction
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: History of significant medical problems (American Society of Anesthesiologists classification III or greater)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Recently taken central nervous system depressants (including alcohol or any analgesic medications within 6 hours before treatment)
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has a history of sickle cell disease and has had positive history of sickle cell crises since childhood. He is currently experiencing severe bone pain.
